install.name: Booklibrary Top Listing FREE
install.author: OrdaSoft - Andrey Kvasnevskiy;Aleksey Pakholkov
install.description: Displays Top (you define) books, allows you to set if covers are displayed, sort by hits, date or rating. Displays Links in SEF Urls if you are using an SEF Component/Plugin

param.name: layout
param.label: Alternative Layout
param.description: Use a different layout from the supplied module or overrides in the templates.

param.name: top_number
param.label: How Many Top
param.description: Set If this is a Top 10 or top 5 or even top 1 module

param.name: only_published
param.label: Only Include Published
param.description: Only Include Published Books? Set to No if you want to include all books on database Published or not

param.name: cover_height
param.label: Cover Height
param.description: The height to display book covers in px. Widths are auto calculated to keep aspect ratio.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Module Class Suffix. A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module; this allows individual module styling.

param.name: ItemId
param.label: ItemId
param.description: Enter Id for Menu Item booklibrary
